text: Madeleine Arthur (born March 10, 1997) is an American-Canadian actress, known for her role as young Willa Warren in the ABC drama series The Family. She portrayed Jane Keane, the daughter of Amy Adams' character, in Tim Burton's biographical film Big Eyes (2014). Arthur also has had guest roles in The Killing, The Tomorrow People, and Supernatural. ==Early life== Arthur was born and raised in Vancouver, British Columbia, to Jane (née Walter) and Brian Arthur. She attended Sir Winston Churchill Secondary School, where she was voted as one of the co-valedictorians of her graduating class. Arthur was a competitive gymnast for 13 years before changing her focus to acting. She speaks fluent French. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title !
